title: Did Paden say he'd get sick and quit if he and Harris didn't agree?
subtitle: The so-called president-elect joke failed during an interview with CNN.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: With regard to what he would do if he disagreed with Vice-President-elect Kamala Harris, United States President-elect Joe Biden said: "As I said to Barak, if I reach something where there is a fundamental disagreement between us on the basis of a moral principle, I will get sick and say I will resign."
